ygData.subject: Re: agil or dex?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... So, how encumbered do you generally find yourself? What s your natural strength before magic items? I m wondering if 90 strength would be a safe amount,
ygData.messageBody:
> i play a wood elf, the biggest advantage being that you can wear small or
> medium armor. plus i like to melee, i like to play a battle bard, so i put
> all of my points in to strength. with my enhancing items i am currently at
> 113 strength, 102 agility, and 101 dexterity. so the points will come with

So, how encumbered do you generally find yourself? What's your natural
strength before magic items? I'm wondering if 90 strength would be a safe
amount, when planning to wear bronze and steel plate down the road.

The rest I think I'll be putting into agility, as +dex items are easier to
come by.

Thanks,

---
